property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task.

property.name: mapred.map.tasks
property.description: The default number of map tasks per job (2). Ignored when the value of the ma\ pred.job.tracker property is local.

property.name: mapred.reduce.tasks
property.description: The default number of reduce tasks per job. Typically set to 99% of the cluster's reduce capacity, so that if a node fails the reduces can still be executed in a single wave. Ignored when the value of the mapred.job.tracker property is local.
